genresAdvancedInfo.name: zcc
genresAdvancedInfo.description: ZCC (Zion Christian Church) music is a genre of gospel music that originated in South Africa. It is characterized by its powerful vocals, harmonies, and use of traditional African instruments like the marimba, mbira, and drums. ZCC music has a strong spiritual and religious focus, with lyrics that often reflect the teachings and beliefs of the church. The genre has a large following in South Africa and other parts of the world.
